Reviews.Content: 7 days spouse wouldnt recommend hotel worst enemy service terrible staff rude helpful clean bathroom barely fit grown tv cell phone turkish channels internet available lobby breakfast absolutely terrible exactly 7 days probably bring yourself breakfast charge 5 bar closed expensive bumped actually terrace closed time housekeeping people trough pick trash thats awful ruined visit istanbul run hotel
